vortex.sound

Class SoundEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • vortex.sound.SoundEffect

  • public class SoundEffect
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for loading, playing, looping, pausing, and resuming sound effects. Uses the native java sound library and can therefore only support those formats (.mp3 is not a supported format). It is recommended to use .wav format.
    Author:
    Daniel Stumpff

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundEffect(java.lang.String path)
      The constructor that takes the path of the sound effect to load.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the stream.
      void loopSoundEffect()
      Will loop the sound until the stop method is called.
      void pauseSoundEffect()
      Pause the sound effect.
      void playSoundEffect()
      Begins playing the sound from the beginning of the stream.
      void resumeSoundEffect()
      Resume the sound effect if currently paused.
      void stopSoundEffect()
      Stop the sound, but leave the stream open for future playing.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
